data.comment: The match has started at Goodison Park.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 2, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Sadio Mane puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
That's a fine assist from Andrew Robertson.
In the minute 4, Liverpool have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Liverpool drive forward but Virgil van Dijk is judged offside.
In the minute 5, Michael Oliver awards Liverpool a goal kick.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Virgil van Dijk is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Everton at Goodison Park.
The away team has substituted Virgil van Dijk with Joe Gomez. Jurgen Klopp is thus making his first change.
In Liverpool, Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Liverpool at Goodison Park.
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 13, Liverpool's Roberto Firmino gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Everton defender.
Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
In the minute 15, Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Liverpool.
Throw-in Everton.
In the minute 17, Dominic Calvert-Lewin gets his shot on target but fails to score for Everton.
Liverpool's Sadio Mane has run offside.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
Everton pushes forward through Dominic Calvert-Lewin, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Everton.
In the minute 19, Goal! Everton draw level to 1-1 through a Michael Keane header.
James Rodriguez instrumental with a fine assist.
Liverpool's Mohamed Salah is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick in a good position for Liverpool!
In the minute 25, Trent Alexander-Arnold of Liverpool smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 26, Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Liverpool.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
Seamus Coleman is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Carlo Ancelotti (Everton) is making a first change, with Ben Godfrey replacing the possibly injured Seamus Coleman.
In the minute 33, Liverpool are coming forward and Thiago Alcantara gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 35, Liverpool's Sadio Mane breaks free at Goodison Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Michael Oliver awards Everton a goal kick.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 36, In Liverpool, Mohamed Salah of Liverpool is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Free kick for Everton in the half of Liverpool.
In the minute 38, Goal kick for Everton at Goodison Park.
Liverpool's Mohamed Salah gets in a shot on goal at Goodison Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Everton.
In the minute 41, In Liverpool Everton attack through Dominic Calvert-Lewin. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
Michael Oliver blows against Everton's Andre Gomes for offside.
In the minute 43, Everton have a goal kick.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Everton's Richarlison gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Thiago Alcantara (Liverpool) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Everton, close to Liverpool's area.
In the minute 45, Liverpool needs to be cautious. Everton have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Everton.
Michael Oliver awards Liverpool a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for Liverpool in Liverpool.
The first half has been concluded at Goodison Park.
James Rodriguez (Everton) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half is underway in Liverpool.
In the minute 46, Free kick Liverpool.
Fabinho for Liverpool gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Liverpool Liverpool attack through Jordan Henderson. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Michael Oliver signals a Everton throw-in in Liverpool's half.
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Liverpool have a goal kick.
Everton push forward at Goodison Park and Abdoulaye Doucoure gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Liverpool defence.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 55, Michael Oliver waits before resuming play because Andrew Robertson for Liverpool is still down.
Throw-in Everton.
Andrew Robertson is back on the pitch.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Liverpool at Goodison Park.
Throw-in for Liverpool at Goodison Park.
Michael Oliver awards Everton a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Very nearly a goal for Everton as Richarlisonstrikes the woodwork with a header.
Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
Everton to take a throw-in in Liverpool territory.
In the minute 64, Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
In Liverpool Everton drive forward through James Rodriguez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Everton have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 65, Everton's James Rodriguez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Liverpool at Goodison Park.
In Liverpool Everton's Dominic Calvert-Lewin is caught offside.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Liverpool at Goodison Park.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Liverpool's Sadio Mane has been booked in Liverpool.
In the minute 68, Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Liverpool in the half of Everton.
Andre Gomes for Everton has been booked by Michael Oliver and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 70, Can Liverpool capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Everton's half?
Everton have a goal kick.
Mohamed Salah is on target to give Liverpool a 1-2 advantage.
In the minute 73, Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
The home team replace Andre Gomes with Gylfi Sigurdsson.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Joel Matip (Liverpool) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Everton defenders.
Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Liverpool, close to Everton's area.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
The away team have replaced Roberto Firmino with Diogo Jota. This is the second substitution made today by Jurgen Klopp.
Alex Iwobi is replacing Abdoulaye Doucoure for the home team.
In the minute 79, Liverpool drives forward and Mohamed Salah gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! The home team draw level at 2-2 through a header from Dominic Calvert-Lewin.
In the minute 81, Lucas Digne with an assist there.
Sadio Mane of Liverpool smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sadio Mane's header is off-target for Liverpool.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
Liverpool have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 84, Fabinho (Liverpool) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to James Rodriguez for Everton who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Everton's James Rodriguez is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 86, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Liverpool.
Liverpool's Trent Alexander-Arnold breaks free at Goodison Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Everton at Goodison Park.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 88, Allan (Everton) gets a yellow card.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Liverpool to check on Richarlison, who is grimacing with pain.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Sadio Mane for the away team is judged to be offside.
Everton have a goal kick.
Liverpool will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Everton.
The match has come to a close in Liverpool. The final score is 2-2.
He's off! Richarlison is shown a red card.
Liverpool make their third substitution with Georginio Wijnaldum replacing Fabinho.
